argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | llnset.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | llnset.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 3 |  | llnset.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 4 |  | llnset.n | |- N = ( LLines ` K ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_islln | |- ( K e. D -> ( X e. N <-> ( X e. B /\ E. p e. A p C X ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_baibd | |- ( ( K e. D /\ X e. B ) -> ( X e. N <-> E. p e. A p C X ) ) |
